item.title: Keep up: this is the new feminism
item.author: Veronica Gouvea,
item.description: Dear Sir – The word “feminism” is meant to be on opposite ends of the spectrum with “sexism”. Arguably it is the only means to combating sexism, but I hear this word being misused on a daily basis. If even the most forward-thinking students often disregard the true meaning of the word, how can it be …
